text: Duncan Smart Stewart (born 8 September 1900) was a Scottish professional footballer who played as a full-back for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1900 births Category:People from Dundee Category:Scottish footballers Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category: Southend United F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Year of death missing
title: Duncan Stewart (footballer, born 1900)
